Schema class

Table: class.audit

class.audit Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text

Index - Schema class

Table: class.audit_trail

class.audit_trail Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text

Table class.audit_trail Inherits audit,

Index - Schema class

Table: class.epp_setting

class.epp_setting Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
host text
port integer DEFAULT 700
conn_min integer DEFAULT 1
conn_max integer DEFAULT 10

 

class.epp_setting Constraints
Name Constraint
epp_setting_check CHECK (((conn_min > 0) AND (conn_max > 0) AND (conn_max > conn_min)))
epp_setting_port_check CHECK (((port > 0) AND (port < 65536)))

Index - Schema class

Table: class.provision

class.provision Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.accreditation.id accreditation_id uuid NOT NULL
public.tenant_customer.id tenant_customer_id uuid NOT NULL
provisioned_date timestamp with time zone
public.provision_status.id status_id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT tc_id_from_name('provision_status'::text, 'pending'::text)
roid text
public.job.id job_id uuid
order_item_plan_ids uuid[]

order_item_plan_id's that need to be notified (Via UPDATE) when this transaction completes
result_message text
result_data jsonb

Index - Schema class

Table: class.soft_delete

class.soft_delete Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
deleted_date timestamp with time zone
deleted_by text

Index - Schema class

Schema cron

Table: cron.job

cron.job Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
jobid bigint PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT nextval('cron.jobid_seq'::regclass)
schedule text NOT NULL
command text NOT NULL
nodename text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'localhost'::text
nodeport integer NOT NULL DEFAULT inet_server_port()
database text NOT NULL DEFAULT current_database()
username text UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
active boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true
jobname name UNIQUE#1

Index - Schema cron

Table: cron.job_run_details

cron.job_run_details Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
jobid bigint
runid bigint PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT nextval('cron.runid_seq'::regclass)
job_pid integer
database text
username text
command text
status text
return_message text
start_time timestamp with time zone
end_time timestamp with time zone

Index - Schema cron

Function: cron.alter_job(job_id bigint, schedule text, command text, database text, username text, active boolean)

Returns: void

Language: C

Alter the job identified by job_id. Any option left as NULL will not be modified.

cron_alter_job

Function: cron.job_cache_invalidate()

Returns: trigger

Language: C

invalidate job cache

cron_job_cache_invalidate

Function: cron.schedule(job_name text, schedule text, command text)

Returns: bigint

Language: C

schedule a pg_cron job

cron_schedule_named

Function: cron.schedule(schedule text, command text)

Returns: bigint

Language: C

schedule a pg_cron job

cron_schedule

Function: cron.schedule_in_database(job_name text, schedule text, command text, database text, username text, active boolean)

Returns: bigint

Language: C

schedule a pg_cron job

cron_schedule_named

Function: cron.unschedule(job_id bigint)

Returns: boolean

Language: C

unschedule a pg_cron job

cron_unschedule

Function: cron.unschedule(job_name name)

Returns: boolean

Language: C

unschedule a pg_cron job

cron_unschedule_named

Schema public

standard public schema

Table: public.accreditation

public.accreditation Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
name text UNIQUE NOT NULL
public.tenant.id tenant_id uuid NOT NULL
public.provider_instance.id provider_instance_id uuid NOT NULL
service_range tstzrange NOT NULL DEFAULT '(-infinity,infinity)'::tstzrange

This attribute serves to limit the applicability of a relation over time.

Table public.accreditation Inherits audit_trail,

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • class.provision
  • public.accreditation_epp
  • public.accreditation_tld
  • accreditation_tenant_id_provider_instance_id_service_range_excl tenant_id, provider_instance_id, service_range

Index - Schema public

Table: public.accreditation_epp

public.accreditation_epp Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text
host text
port integer DEFAULT 700
conn_min integer DEFAULT 1
conn_max integer DEFAULT 10
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.accreditation.id accreditation_id uuid NOT NULL
public.tenant_cert.id cert_id uuid
clid text NOT NULL
pw text NOT NULL

Table public.accreditation_epp Inherits audit_trail, epp_setting,

 

public.accreditation_epp Constraints
Name Constraint
epp_setting_check CHECK (((conn_min > 0) AND (conn_max > 0) AND (conn_max > conn_min)))
epp_setting_port_check CHECK (((port > 0) AND (port < 65536)))

Index - Schema public

Table: public.accreditation_tld

tlds covered by an accreditation

public.accreditation_tld Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.accreditation.id accreditation_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
public.provider_instance_tld.id provider_instance_tld_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
is_default boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.domain
  • public.order_item_create_domain
  • public.order_item_renew_domain
  • public.provision_domain

Table public.contact_postal Inherits audit_trail,

 

public.contact_postal Constraints
Name Constraint
contact_postal_check CHECK ((((NOT is_org) AND (COALESCE(org_reg, org_vat, org_duns) IS NULL) AND (first_name IS NOT NULL) AND (last_name IS NOT NULL)) OR (is_org AND (org_name IS NOT NULL))))

Index - Schema public

Table: public.country

public.country Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
name text UNIQUE NOT NULL

The country's name.
alpha2 text UNIQUE NOT NULL

The ISO 3166-1 two letter country code, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2.
alpha3 text NOT NULL
calling_code text

The country's calling code accord, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_country_calling_codes.

 

public.country Constraints
Name Constraint
country_alpha2_check CHECK ((length(alpha2) = 2))
country_alpha3_check CHECK ((length(alpha3) = 3))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.contact_postal

Index - Schema public

Table: public.create_domain_contact

contains the association of contacts and domains at order time

public.create_domain_contact Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()

public.domain_contact_type.id domain_contact_type_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
public.order_contact.id order_contact_id uuid UNIQUE#1

since the order_contact table inherits from the contact table, the data will be available in the contact, this also allow for contact reutilization

Table: public.error_dictionary

This table contains the description for all error messages that can be generated by the system. It is directly used used by database functions to `RAISE EXCEPTION` when required.

public.error_dictionary Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id integer PRIMARY KEY
public.error_category.id category_id uuid NOT NULL
message text NOT NULL
columns_affected text[]

Index - Schema public

Table: public.migration

Record of schema migrations applied.

public.migration Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
version text PRIMARY KEY

Timestamp string of migration file in format YYYYMMDDHHMMSS (must match filename).
name text NOT NULL

Name of migration from migration filename.
applied_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()

Postgres timestamp when migration was recorded.

Table: public.order_item_plan

stores the plan on how an order must be provisioned

public.order_item_plan Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
order_item_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
public.order_item_plan.id parent_id uuid
public.order_item_plan_status.id status_id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT tc_id_from_name('order_item_plan_status'::text, 'new'::text)
public.order_item_object.id order_item_object_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
reference_id uuid

since a foreign key would depend on the `order_item_object_id` type, to simplify the setup the reference_id is used to conditionally point to rows in the `create_domain_*` tables
result_message text
result_data jsonb

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.order_item_plan
  • order_item_plan_parent_id_idx parent_id

Table: public.order_status_path

Names the valid "paths" that an order can take, this allows for flexibility on the possibility of using multiple payment methods that may or may not offer auth/capture.

public.order_status_path Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
name text UNIQUE NOT NULL
descr text

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.order
  • public.order_status_transition

tuples in this table become valid status transitions for orders

F-Key Name Type Description
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.order_status_path.id path_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
public.order_status.id from_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL
public.order_status.id to_id uuid UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

  • public.order_item_strategy

Index - Schema public

View: public.pg_all_foreign_keys

public.pg_all_foreign_keys Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
fk_schema_name name
fk_table_name name
fk_constraint_name name
fk_table_oid oid
fk_columns name[]
pk_schema_name name
pk_table_name name
pk_constraint_name name
pk_table_oid oid
pk_index_name name
pk_columns name[]
match_type text
on_delete text
on_update text
is_deferrable boolean
is_deferred boolean 
SELECT n1.nspname AS fk_schema_name
,
    c1.relname AS fk_table_name
,
    k1.conname AS fk_constraint_name
,
    c1.oid AS fk_table_oid
,
    _pg_sv_column_array
(k1.conrelid
     , k1.conkey
) AS fk_columns
,
    n2.nspname AS pk_schema_name
,
    c2.relname AS pk_table_name
,
    k2.conname AS pk_constraint_name
,
    c2.oid AS pk_table_oid
,
    ci.relname AS pk_index_name
,
    _pg_sv_column_array
(k1.confrelid
     , k1.confkey
) AS pk_columns
,
        CASE k1.confmatchtype
            WHEN 'f'::"char" THEN 'FULL'::text
            WHEN 'p'::"char" THEN 'PARTIAL'::text
            WHEN 'u'::"char" THEN 
'NONE'::text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END AS match_type
,
        CASE k1.confdeltype
            WHEN 'a'::"char" THEN 
'NO ACTION'::text
            WHEN 'c'::"char" THEN 'CASCADE'::text
            WHEN 'd'::"char" THEN 'SET DEFAULT'::text
            WHEN 'n'::"char" THEN 'SET NULL'::text
            WHEN 'r'::"char" THEN 'RESTRICT'::text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END AS on_delete
,
        CASE k1.confupdtype
            WHEN 'a'::"char" THEN 
'NO ACTION'::text
            WHEN 'c'::"char" THEN 'CASCADE'::text
            WHEN 'd'::"char" THEN 'SET DEFAULT'::text
            WHEN 'n'::"char" THEN 'SET NULL'::text
            WHEN 'r'::"char" THEN 'RESTRICT'::text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END AS on_update
,
    k1.condeferrable AS is_deferrable
,
    k1.condeferred AS is_deferred
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (
                                   (
                                         (pg_constraint k1
     
                                            JOIN pg_namespace n1 
                                              ON (
                                                     (n1.oid = k1.connamespace)
                                               )
                                         )
     
                                      JOIN pg_class c1 
                                        ON (
                                               (c1.oid = k1.conrelid)
                                         )
                                   )
     
                                JOIN pg_class c2 
                                  ON (
                                         (c2.oid = k1.confrelid)
                                   )
                             )
     
                          JOIN pg_namespace n2 
                            ON (
                                   (n2.oid = c2.relnamespace)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN pg_depend d 
                      ON (
                             (
                                   (d.classid = 
                                         ('pg_constraint'::regclass)::oid
                                   )
                                 AND (d.objid = k1.oid)
                                 AND (d.objsubid = 0)
                                 AND (d.deptype = 'n'::"char")
                                 AND (d.refclassid = 
                                         ('pg_class'::regclass)::oid
                                   )
                                 AND (d.refobjsubid = 0)
                             )
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN pg_class ci 
                ON (
                       (
                             (ci.oid = d.refobjid)
                           AND (ci.relkind = 'i'::"char")
                       )
                 )
           )
     
   LEFT JOIN pg_depend d2 
          ON (
                 (
                       (d2.classid = 
                             ('pg_class'::regclass)::oid
                       )
                     AND (d2.objid = ci.oid)
                     AND (d2.objsubid = 0)
                     AND (d2.deptype = 'i'::"char")
                     AND (d2.refclassid = 
                             ('pg_constraint'::regclass)::oid
                       )
                     AND (d2.refobjsubid = 0)
                 )
           )
     )
     
LEFT JOIN pg_constraint k2 
    ON (
           (
                 (k2.oid = d2.refobjid)
               AND (k2.contype = ANY 
                       (ARRAY['p'::"char"
                             ,'u'::"char"]
                       )
                 )
           )
     )
)
  
WHERE (
     (k1.conrelid <> 
           (0)::oid
     )
   AND (k1.confrelid <> 
           (0)::oid
     )
   AND (k1.contype = 'f'::"char")
   AND _pg_sv_table_accessible
     (n1.oid
           , c1.oid
     )
);

Index - Schema public

Index - Schema public

Table: public.provider_instance

within a backend provider, there can be multiple instances, which could represent customers or simply buckets where the tlds are placed, each one of these are considered instances each one with its own credentials, etc.

public.provider_instance Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.provider.id provider_id uuid NOT NULL
name text UNIQUE NOT NULL
descr text
is_proxy boolean

whether this provider is forwarding requests to another (hexonet, opensrs, etc.)

Table public.provider_instance Inherits audit_trail,

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.accreditation
  • public.order_item_strategy
  • public.provider_instance_epp
  • public.provider_instance_http
  • public.provider_instance_tld

Table: public.provider_instance_epp

public.provider_instance_epp Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
host text
port integer DEFAULT 700
conn_min integer DEFAULT 1
conn_max integer DEFAULT 10
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.provider_instance.id provider_instance_id uuid UNIQUE NOT NULL

Table public.provider_instance_epp Inherits epp_setting,

 

public.provider_instance_epp Constraints
Name Constraint
epp_setting_check CHECK (((conn_min > 0) AND (conn_max > 0) AND (conn_max > conn_min)))
epp_setting_port_check CHECK (((port > 0) AND (port < 65536)))
provider_instance_epp_host_check CHECK ((host IS NOT NULL))
provider_instance_epp_port_check CHECK ((port IS NOT NULL))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

  • public.provider_instance_epp_ext

Index - Schema public

Table: public.provider_instance_tld

public.provider_instance_tld Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now()
updated_date timestamp with time zone
created_by text DEFAULT CURRENT_USER
updated_by text
id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid()
public.provider_instance.id provider_instance_id uuid NOT NULL
public.tld.id tld_id uuid NOT NULL
service_range tstzrange NOT NULL DEFAULT '(-infinity,infinity)'::tstzrange

This attribute serves to limit the applicablity of a relation over time. A constraint named service_range_unique ensures that for a given instance_id, tld_id, there is no overlap of the service range.

Table public.provider_instance_tld Inherits audit_trail,

Index - Schema public

View: public.tap_funky

public.tap_funky Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
oid oid
schema name
name name
owner name
args text
returns text
langoid oid
is_strict boolean
kind "char"
is_definer boolean
returns_set boolean
volatility character(1)
is_visible boolean 
SELECT p.oid
,
    n.nspname AS schema
,
    p.proname AS name
,
    pg_get_userbyid
(p.proowner) AS owner
,
    array_to_string
(
     (p.proargtypes)::regtype[]
     ,','::text
) AS args
,
    
(
        CASE p.proretset
            WHEN true THEN 'setof '::text
            ELSE ''::text
        END || 
     (p.prorettype)::regtype
) AS returns
,
    p.prolang AS langoid
,
    p.proisstrict AS is_strict
,
    _prokind
(p.oid) AS kind
,
    p.prosecdef AS is_definer
,
    p.proretset AS returns_set
,
    
(p.provolatile)::character
(1) AS volatility
,
    pg_function_is_visible
(p.oid) AS is_visible
   
FROM (pg_proc p
     
  JOIN pg_namespace n 
    ON (
           (p.pronamespace = n.oid)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_accreditation

public.v_accreditation Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
tenant_id uuid
accreditation_id uuid
provider_instance_id uuid
provider_id uuid
tenant_name text
accreditation_name text
provider_name text
provider_instance_name text
is_proxy boolean 
SELECT a.tenant_id
,
    a.id AS accreditation_id
,
    pi.id AS provider_instance_id
,
    p.id AS provider_id
,
    tn.name AS tenant_name
,
    a.name AS accreditation_name
,
    p.name AS provider_name
,
    pi.name AS provider_instance_name
,
    pi.is_proxy
   
FROM (
     (
           (accreditation a
     
              JOIN tenant tn 
                ON (
                       (tn.id = a.tenant_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN provider_instance pi 
          ON (
                 (pi.id = a.provider_instance_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN provider p 
    ON (
           (p.id = pi.provider_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_accreditation_epp

public.v_accreditation_epp Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
tenant_name text
tenant_id uuid
provider_id uuid
provider_name text
accreditation_name text
accreditation_id uuid
accreditation_epp_id uuid
cert_id uuid
clid text
pw text
host text
port integer
conn_min integer
conn_max integer 
SELECT t.name AS tenant_name
,
    t.id AS tenant_id
,
    p.id AS provider_id
,
    p.name AS provider_name
,
    a.name AS accreditation_name
,
    a.id AS accreditation_id
,
    ae.id AS accreditation_epp_id
,
    ae.cert_id
,
    ae.clid
,
    ae.pw
,
    COALESCE
(ae.host
     , pie.host
) AS host
,
    COALESCE
(ae.port
     , pie.port
) AS port
,
    COALESCE
(ae.conn_min
     , pie.conn_min
) AS conn_min
,
    COALESCE
(ae.conn_max
     , pie.conn_max
) AS conn_max
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (accreditation_epp ae
     
                          JOIN accreditation a 
                            ON (
                                   (a.id = ae.accreditation_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN tenant t 
                      ON (
                             (t.id = a.tenant_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN provider_instance pi 
                ON (
                       (pi.id = a.provider_instance_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN provider_instance_epp pie 
          ON (
                 (pie.provider_instance_id = a.provider_instance_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN provider p 
    ON (
           (p.id = pi.provider_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_accreditation_tld

public.v_accreditation_tld Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
tenant_id uuid
accreditation_id uuid
accreditation_name text
accreditation_tld_id uuid
tenant_customer_id uuid
tenant_customer_number text
customer_id uuid
customer_name text
tld_id uuid
tld_name text
provider_name text
provider_id uuid
provider_instance_id uuid
provider_instance_name text
is_proxy boolean
is_default boolean 
SELECT a.tenant_id
,
    a.id AS accreditation_id
,
    a.name AS accreditation_name
,
    at.id AS accreditation_tld_id
,
    tnc.id AS tenant_customer_id
,
    tnc.customer_number AS tenant_customer_number
,
    c.id AS customer_id
,
    c.name AS customer_name
,
    t.id AS tld_id
,
    t.name AS tld_name
,
    p.name AS provider_name
,
    p.id AS provider_id
,
    pi.id AS provider_instance_id
,
    pi.name AS provider_instance_name
,
    pi.is_proxy
,
    at.is_default
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (
                                   (
                                         (accreditation a
     
                                            JOIN tenant tn 
                                              ON (
                                                     (tn.id = a.tenant_id)
                                               )
                                         )
     
                                      JOIN tenant_customer tnc 
                                        ON (
                                               (tnc.tenant_id = tn.id)
                                         )
                                   )
     
                                JOIN customer c 
                                  ON (
                                         (c.id = tnc.customer_id)
                                   )
                             )
     
                          JOIN accreditation_tld at 
                            ON (
                                   (at.accreditation_id = a.id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN provider_instance_tld pit 
                      ON (
                             (
                                   (pit.id = at.provider_instance_tld_id)
                                 AND (pit.service_range @> now
                                         ()
                                   )
                             )
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN provider_instance pi 
                ON (
                       (
                             (pi.id = pit.provider_instance_id)
                           AND (a.provider_instance_id = pi.id)
                       )
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN provider p 
          ON (
                 (p.id = pi.provider_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN tld t 
    ON (
           (t.id = pit.tld_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_error_dictionary

public.v_error_dictionary Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
id integer
category text
message text
columns_affected text[] 
SELECT d.id
,
    c.name AS category
,
    d.message
,
    d.columns_affected
   
FROM (error_dictionary d
     
  JOIN error_category c 
    ON (
           (c.id = d.category_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_job

public.v_job Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
job_id uuid
tenant_customer_id uuid
job_status_name text
job_type_name text
start_date timestamp with time zone
end_date timestamp with time zone
retry_date timestamp with time zone
retry_count integer
reference_id uuid
reference_table text
data jsonb
tenant_customer jsonb
routing_key text
job_status_is_final boolean
event_id text 
SELECT j.id AS job_id
,
    j.tenant_customer_id
,
    js.name AS job_status_name
,
    jt.name AS job_type_name
,
    j.start_date
,
    j.end_date
,
    j.retry_date
,
    j.retry_count
,
    j.reference_id
,
    jt.reference_table
,
    j.data
,
    to_jsonb
(vtc.*) AS tenant_customer
,
    jt.routing_key
,
    js.is_final AS job_status_is_final
,
    j.event_id
   
FROM (
     (
           (job j
     
              JOIN job_status js 
                ON (
                       (j.status_id = js.id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN job_type jt 
          ON (
                 (jt.id = j.type_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN v_tenant_customer vtc 
    ON (
           (vtc.id = j.tenant_customer_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_job_history

public.v_job_history Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
created_date timestamp with time zone
statement_date timestamp with time zone
operation text
job_type_name text
job_id uuid
status_name text
event_id text 
SELECT at.created_date
,
    at.statement_date
,
    at.operation
,
    jt.name AS job_type_name
,
    at.object_id AS job_id
,
    js.name AS status_name
,
    
(at.new_value -> 'event_id'::text) AS event_id
   
FROM (
     (audit_trail_log at
     
        JOIN job_status js 
          ON (
                 (js.id = 
                       (COALESCE
                             (
                                   (at.new_value -> 'status_id'::text)
                                   , (at.old_value -> 'status_id'::text)
                             )
                       )::uuid
                 )
           )
     )
     
  JOIN job_type jt 
    ON (
           (jt.id = 
                 (COALESCE
                       (
                             (at.new_value -> 'type_id'::text)
                             , (at.old_value -> 'type_id'::text)
                       )
                 )::uuid
           )
     )
)
  
WHERE (at.table_name = 'job'::text)
  
ORDER BY at.created_date;

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order

public.v_order Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_id uuid
product_id uuid
order_type_id uuid
order_path_id uuid
order_status_id uuid
tenant_customer_id uuid
tenant_id uuid
customer_id uuid
product_name text
order_type_name text
order_path_name text
order_status_name text
tenant_name text
customer_name text
order_status_is_final boolean
order_status_is_success boolean
created_date timestamp with time zone
updated_date timestamp with time zone
elapsed interval 
SELECT o.id AS order_id
,
    p.id AS product_id
,
    ot.id AS order_type_id
,
    osp.id AS order_path_id
,
    os.id AS order_status_id
,
    tc.id AS tenant_customer_id
,
    t.id AS tenant_id
,
    c.id AS customer_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    osp.name AS order_path_name
,
    os.name AS order_status_name
,
    t.name AS tenant_name
,
    c.name AS customer_name
,
    os.is_final AS order_status_is_final
,
    os.is_success AS order_status_is_success
,
    o.created_date
,
    o.updated_date
,
    
(o.updated_date - o.created_date) AS elapsed
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (
                                   ("order" o
     
                                      JOIN order_status os 
                                        ON (
                                               (os.id = o.status_id)
                                         )
                                   )
     
                                JOIN order_status_path osp 
                                  ON (
                                         (osp.id = o.path_id)
                                   )
                             )
     
                          JOIN order_type ot 
                            ON (
                                   (ot.id = o.type_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN product p 
                      ON (
                             (p.id = ot.product_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN tenant_customer tc 
                ON (
                       (tc.id = o.tenant_customer_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN tenant t 
          ON (
                 (t.id = tc.tenant_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN customer c 
    ON (
           (c.id = tc.customer_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_create_domain

public.v_order_create_domain Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_item_id uuid
order_id uuid
accreditation_tld_id uuid
tenant_customer_id uuid
type_id uuid
customer_user_id uuid
status_id uuid
status_name text
status_descr text
tenant_id uuid
customer_id uuid
tenant_name text
name text
provider_name text
provider_instance_id uuid
provider_instance_name text
tld_id uuid
tld_name text
accreditation_id uuid
domain_name fqdn
registration_period integer 
SELECT cd.id AS order_item_id
,
    cd.order_id
,
    cd.accreditation_tld_id
,
    o.tenant_customer_id
,
    o.type_id
,
    o.customer_user_id
,
    o.status_id
,
    s.name AS status_name
,
    s.descr AS status_descr
,
    tc.tenant_id
,
    tc.customer_id
,
    tc.tenant_name
,
    tc.name
,
    at.provider_name
,
    at.provider_instance_id
,
    at.provider_instance_name
,
    at.tld_id
,
    at.tld_name
,
    at.accreditation_id
,
    cd.name AS domain_name
,
    cd.registration_period
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (order_item_create_domain cd
     
                          JOIN"order" o 
                            ON (
                                   (o.id = cd.order_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN v_order_type ot 
                      ON (
                             (ot.id = o.type_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN v_tenant_customer tc 
                ON (
                       (tc.id = o.tenant_customer_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN order_status s 
          ON (
                 (s.id = o.status_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN v_accreditation_tld at 
    ON (
           (at.accreditation_tld_id = cd.accreditation_tld_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_item_plan

public.v_order_item_plan Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_id uuid
id uuid
parent_id uuid
order_type_id uuid
product_id uuid
order_item_id uuid
plan_status_id uuid
object_id uuid
product_name text
order_type_name text
plan_status_name text
plan_status_is_success boolean
plan_status_is_final boolean
object_name text
reference_id uuid
parent_object_name text
depth integer 
 WITH RECURSIVE plan AS NOT MATERIALIZED 
(
         
SELECT o.id AS order_id
     ,
            p.id
     ,
            p.parent_id
     ,
            t.id AS order_type_id
     ,
            prod.id AS product_id
     ,
            p.order_item_id
     ,
            s.id AS plan_status_id
     ,
            obj.id AS object_id
     ,
            prod.name AS product_name
     ,
            t.name AS order_type_name
     ,
            s.name AS plan_status_name
     ,
            s.is_success AS plan_status_is_success
     ,
            s.is_final AS plan_status_is_final
     ,
            obj.name AS object_name
     ,
            p.reference_id
     ,
            NULL::text AS parent_object_name
     ,
            0 AS depth
           
  FROM (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (
                                   (order_item_plan p
             
                                      JOIN order_item_object obj 
                                        ON (
                                               (obj.id = p.order_item_object_id)
                                         )
                                   )
             
                                JOIN order_item_plan_status s 
                                  ON (
                                         (s.id = p.status_id)
                                   )
                             )
             
                          JOIN order_item oi 
                            ON (
                                   (oi.id = p.order_item_id)
                             )
                       )
             
                    JOIN"order" o 
                      ON (
                             (o.id = oi.order_id)
                       )
                 )
             
              JOIN order_type t 
                ON (
                       (t.id = o.type_id)
                 )
           )
             
        JOIN product prod 
          ON (
                 (prod.id = t.product_id)
           )
     )
          
 WHERE (p.parent_id IS NULL)
        
 UNION
         
SELECT o.id AS order_id
     ,
            p.id
     ,
            p.parent_id
     ,
            t.id AS order_type_id
     ,
            prod.id AS product_id
     ,
            p.order_item_id
     ,
            s.id AS plan_status_id
     ,
            obj.id AS object_id
     ,
            prod.name AS product_name
     ,
            t.name AS order_type_name
     ,
            s.name AS plan_status_name
     ,
            s.is_success AS plan_status_is_success
     ,
            s.is_final AS plan_status_is_final
     ,
            obj.name AS object_name
     ,
            p.reference_id
     ,
            plan_1.object_name AS parent_object_name
     ,
            
     (plan_1.depth + 1)
           
  FROM (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (
                                   (
                                         (order_item_plan p
             
                                            JOIN order_item_object obj 
                                              ON (
                                                     (obj.id = p.order_item_object_id)
                                               )
                                         )
             
                                      JOIN order_item_plan_status s 
                                        ON (
                                               (s.id = p.status_id)
                                         )
                                   )
             
                                JOIN order_item oi 
                                  ON (
                                         (oi.id = p.order_item_id)
                                   )
                             )
             
                          JOIN"order" o 
                            ON (
                                   (o.id = oi.order_id)
                             )
                       )
             
                    JOIN order_type t 
                      ON (
                             (t.id = o.type_id)
                       )
                 )
             
              JOIN product prod 
                ON (
                       (prod.id = t.product_id)
                 )
           )
             
        JOIN plan plan_1 
          ON (
                 (p.parent_id = plan_1.id)
           )
     )
        
)
 
SELECT plan.order_id
,
    plan.id
,
    plan.parent_id
,
    plan.order_type_id
,
    plan.product_id
,
    plan.order_item_id
,
    plan.plan_status_id
,
    plan.object_id
,
    plan.product_name
,
    plan.order_type_name
,
    plan.plan_status_name
,
    plan.plan_status_is_success
,
    plan.plan_status_is_final
,
    plan.object_name
,
    plan.reference_id
,
    plan.parent_object_name
,
    plan.depth
   
FROM plan
  
ORDER BY plan.depth DESC;

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_item_plan_object

public.v_order_item_plan_object Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_item_id uuid
product_name text
order_type_name text
object_name text
object_id uuid
id uuid 
SELECT d.id AS order_item_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    obj.name AS object_name
,
    obj.id AS object_id
,
    distinct_order_contact.id
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (order_item_create_domain d
     
                          JOIN"order" o 
                            ON (
                                   (o.id = d.order_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN order_type ot 
                      ON (
                             (ot.id = o.type_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN product p 
                ON (
                       (p.id = ot.product_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN order_item_object obj 
          ON (
                 (obj.name = 'contact'::text)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN LATERAL 
     (
      SELECT DISTINCT create_domain_contact.order_contact_id AS id
           
        FROM create_domain_contact
          
       WHERE (create_domain_contact.create_domain_id = d.id)
     ) distinct_order_contact 
    ON (true)
)
UNION
 
SELECT d.id AS order_item_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    obj.name AS object_name
,
    obj.id AS object_id
,
    distinct_order_host.id
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (order_item_create_domain d
     
                          JOIN"order" o 
                            ON (
                                   (o.id = d.order_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN order_type ot 
                      ON (
                             (ot.id = o.type_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN product p 
                ON (
                       (p.id = ot.product_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN order_item_object obj 
          ON (
                 (obj.name = 'host'::text)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN LATERAL 
     (
      SELECT DISTINCT create_domain_nameserver.id
           
        FROM create_domain_nameserver
          
       WHERE (create_domain_nameserver.create_domain_id = d.id)
     ) distinct_order_host 
    ON (true)
)
UNION
 
SELECT d.id AS order_item_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    obj.name AS object_name
,
    obj.id AS object_id
,
    d.id
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (order_item_create_domain d
     
                    JOIN"order" o 
                      ON (
                             (o.id = d.order_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN order_type ot 
                ON (
                       (ot.id = o.type_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN product p 
          ON (
                 (p.id = ot.product_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN order_item_object obj 
    ON (
           (obj.name = 'domain'::text)
     )
)
UNION
 
SELECT d.id AS order_item_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    obj.name AS object_name
,
    obj.id AS object_id
,
    d.id
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (order_item_renew_domain d
     
                    JOIN"order" o 
                      ON (
                             (o.id = d.order_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN order_type ot 
                ON (
                       (ot.id = o.type_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN product p 
          ON (
                 (p.id = ot.product_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN order_item_object obj 
    ON (
           (obj.name = 'domain'::text)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_item_plan_status

public.v_order_item_plan_status Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_id uuid
order_item_id uuid
depth integer
total bigint
total_new bigint
total_success bigint
total_fail bigint
total_processing bigint
objects text[]
object_ids uuid[] 
SELECT v_order_item_plan.order_id
,
    v_order_item_plan.order_item_id
,
    v_order_item_plan.depth
,
    count
(*) AS total
,
    count
(*) FILTER 
(
 WHERE (v_order_item_plan.plan_status_name = 'new'::text)
) AS total_new
,
    count
(*) FILTER 
(
 WHERE (v_order_item_plan.plan_status_is_success 
         AND v_order_item_plan.plan_status_is_final
     )
) AS total_success
,
    count
(*) FILTER 
(
 WHERE (
           (NOT v_order_item_plan.plan_status_is_success)
         AND v_order_item_plan.plan_status_is_final
     )
) AS total_fail
,
    count
(*) FILTER 
(
 WHERE (
           (NOT v_order_item_plan.plan_status_is_final)
         AND (v_order_item_plan.plan_status_name <> 'new'::text)
     )
) AS total_processing
,
    array_agg
(v_order_item_plan.object_name) AS objects
,
    array_agg
(v_order_item_plan.object_id) AS object_ids
   
FROM v_order_item_plan
  
GROUP BY v_order_item_plan.order_id
, v_order_item_plan.order_item_id
, v_order_item_plan.depth
  
ORDER BY v_order_item_plan.depth DESC;

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_product_type

public.v_order_product_type Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
product_id uuid
product_name text
type_id uuid
type_name text
rel_name text 
SELECT p.id AS product_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    t.id AS type_id
,
    t.name AS type_name
,
    format
('order_item_%s_%s'::text
     , t.name
     , p.name
) AS rel_name
   
FROM (product p
     
  JOIN order_type t 
    ON (
           (t.product_id = p.id)
     )
)
  
ORDER BY p.name
, t.name;

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_renew_domain

public.v_order_renew_domain Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
order_item_id uuid
order_id uuid
accreditation_tld_id uuid
tenant_customer_id uuid
type_id uuid
customer_user_id uuid
status_id uuid
status_name text
status_descr text
tenant_id uuid
customer_id uuid
tenant_name text
name text
provider_name text
provider_instance_id uuid
provider_instance_name text
tld_id uuid
tld_name text
accreditation_id uuid
domain_name text
domain_id uuid
period integer
current_expiry_date timestamp with time zone 
SELECT rd.id AS order_item_id
,
    rd.order_id
,
    rd.accreditation_tld_id
,
    o.tenant_customer_id
,
    o.type_id
,
    o.customer_user_id
,
    o.status_id
,
    s.name AS status_name
,
    s.descr AS status_descr
,
    tc.tenant_id
,
    tc.customer_id
,
    tc.tenant_name
,
    tc.name
,
    at.provider_name
,
    at.provider_instance_id
,
    at.provider_instance_name
,
    at.tld_id
,
    at.tld_name
,
    at.accreditation_id
,
    d.name AS domain_name
,
    d.id AS domain_id
,
    rd.period
,
    rd.current_expiry_date
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (order_item_renew_domain rd
     
                                JOIN"order" o 
                                  ON (
                                         (o.id = rd.order_id)
                                   )
                             )
     
                          JOIN v_order_type ot 
                            ON (
                                   (ot.id = o.type_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN v_tenant_customer tc 
                      ON (
                             (tc.id = o.tenant_customer_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN order_status s 
                ON (
                       (s.id = o.status_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN v_accreditation_tld at 
          ON (
                 (at.accreditation_tld_id = rd.accreditation_tld_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN domain d 
    ON (
           (
                 (d.tenant_customer_id = o.tenant_customer_id)
               AND (d.name = 
                       (rd.name)::text
                 )
           )
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_status_transition

public.v_order_status_transition Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
path_id uuid
path_name text
source_status_id uuid
target_status_id uuid
from_status text
to_status text
is_source_success boolean
is_target_success boolean
is_final boolean 
SELECT ost.path_id
,
    osp.name AS path_name
,
    f.id AS source_status_id
,
    t.id AS target_status_id
,
    f.name AS from_status
,
    t.name AS to_status
,
    f.is_success AS is_source_success
,
    t.is_success AS is_target_success
,
    t.is_final
   
FROM (
     (
           (order_status_transition ost
     
              JOIN order_status_path osp 
                ON (
                       (osp.id = ost.path_id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN order_status f 
          ON (
                 (f.id = ost.from_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN order_status t 
    ON (
           (t.id = ost.to_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_order_type

public.v_order_type Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
product_id uuid
product_name text
id uuid
name text 
SELECT p.id AS product_id
,
    p.name AS product_name
,
    ot.id
,
    ot.name
   
FROM (product p
     
  JOIN order_type ot 
    ON (
           (ot.product_id = p.id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_provider_instance_order_item_strategy

public.v_provider_instance_order_item_strategy Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
provider_name text
provider_id uuid
provider_instance_id uuid
provider_instance_name text
object_name text
object_id uuid
order_type_id uuid
order_type_name text
product_id uuid
product_name text
provision_order integer
is_default boolean 
 WITH default_strategy AS 
(
         
SELECT t.id AS type_id
     ,
            o.id AS object_id
     ,
            s_1.provision_order
           
  FROM (
           (order_item_strategy s_1
             
              JOIN order_item_object o 
                ON (
                       (o.id = s_1.object_id)
                 )
           )
             
        JOIN order_type t 
          ON (
                 (t.id = s_1.order_type_id)
           )
     )
          
 WHERE (s_1.provider_instance_id IS NULL)
        
)
 
SELECT p.name AS provider_name
,
    p.id AS provider_id
,
    pi.id AS provider_instance_id
,
    pi.name AS provider_instance_name
,
    dob.name AS object_name
,
    dob.id AS object_id
,
    ot.id AS order_type_id
,
    ot.name AS order_type_name
,
    prod.id AS product_id
,
    prod.name AS product_name
,
    COALESCE
(s.provision_order
     , ds.provision_order
) AS provision_order
,
        CASE
            WHEN 
(s.id IS NULL) THEN true
            ELSE false
        END AS is_default
   
FROM (
     (
           (
                 (
                       (
                             (provider_instance pi
     
                                JOIN default_strategy ds 
                                  ON (true)
                             )
     
                          JOIN provider p 
                            ON (
                                   (p.id = pi.provider_id)
                             )
                       )
     
                    JOIN order_item_object dob 
                      ON (
                             (dob.id = ds.object_id)
                       )
                 )
     
              JOIN order_type ot 
                ON (
                       (ds.type_id = ot.id)
                 )
           )
     
        JOIN product prod 
          ON (
                 (prod.id = ot.product_id)
           )
     )
     
LEFT JOIN order_item_strategy s 
    ON (
           (
                 (s.provider_instance_id = pi.id)
               AND (ot.id = s.order_type_id)
               AND (s.object_id = dob.id)
           )
     )
)
  
ORDER BY p.name
, pi.name
, dob.name
, ot.id;

Index - Schema public

View: public.v_tenant_customer

public.v_tenant_customer Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
tenant_id uuid
customer_id uuid
tenant_name text
tenant_descr text
customer_number text
id uuid
name text
descr text
customer_created_date timestamp with time zone
customer_updated_date timestamp with time zone
tenant_customer_created_date timestamp with time zone
tenant_customer_updated_date timestamp with time zone 
SELECT tc.tenant_id
,
    tc.customer_id
,
    t.name AS tenant_name
,
    t.descr AS tenant_descr
,
    tc.customer_number
,
    tc.id
,
    c.name
,
    c.descr
,
    c.created_date AS customer_created_date
,
    c.updated_date AS customer_updated_date
,
    tc.created_date AS tenant_customer_created_date
,
    tc.updated_date AS tenant_customer_updated_date
   
FROM (
     (tenant_customer tc
     
        JOIN tenant t 
          ON (
                 (t.id = tc.tenant_id)
           )
     )
     
  JOIN customer c 
    ON (
           (c.id = tc.customer_id)
     )
);

Index - Schema public

Function: public._add(text, integer)

Returns: integer

Language: SQL

    SELECT _add($1, $2, '')

Function: public._add(text, integer, text)

Returns: integer

Language: PLPGSQL

BEGIN
    EXECUTE 'INSERT INTO __tcache__ (label, value, note) values (' ||
    quote_literal($1) || ', ' || $2 || ', ' || quote_literal(COALESCE($3, '')) || ')';
    RETURN $2;
END;

Function: public._alike(boolean, anyelement, text, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    result ALIAS FOR $1;
    got    ALIAS FOR $2;
    rx     ALIAS FOR $3;
    descr  ALIAS FOR $4;
    output TEXT;
BEGIN
    output := ok( result, descr );
    RETURN output || CASE result WHEN TRUE THEN '' ELSE E'\n' || diag(
           '                  ' || COALESCE( quote_literal(got), 'NULL' ) ||
       E'\n   doesn''t match: ' || COALESCE( quote_literal(rx), 'NULL' )
    ) END;
END;

Function: public._ancestor_of(name, name, integer)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    WITH RECURSIVE inheritance_chain AS (
        -- select the ancestor tuple
        SELECT i.inhrelid AS descendent_id, 1 AS inheritance_level
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_inherits i
        WHERE i.inhparent = (
            SELECT c1.oid
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
             WHERE c1.relname = $1
               AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible( c1.oid )
        )
        UNION
        -- select the descendents
        SELECT i.inhrelid AS descendent_id,
               p.inheritance_level + 1 AS inheritance_level
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_inherits i
          JOIN inheritance_chain p
            ON p.descendent_id = i.inhparent
         WHERE i.inhrelid = (
            SELECT c1.oid
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
             WHERE c1.relname = $2
               AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible( c1.oid )
        )
    )
    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT true
          FROM inheritance_chain
         WHERE inheritance_level = COALESCE($3, inheritance_level)
           AND descendent_id = (
                SELECT c1.oid
                  FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
                  JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                    ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
                 WHERE c1.relname = $2
                   AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible( c1.oid )
        )
    );

Function: public._ancestor_of(name, name, name, name, integer)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    WITH RECURSIVE inheritance_chain AS (
        -- select the ancestor tuple
        SELECT i.inhrelid AS descendent_id, 1 AS inheritance_level
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_inherits i
        WHERE i.inhparent = (
            SELECT c1.oid
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
             WHERE c1.relname = $2
               AND n1.nspname = $1
        )
        UNION
        -- select the descendents
        SELECT i.inhrelid AS descendent_id,
               p.inheritance_level + 1 AS inheritance_level
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_inherits i
          JOIN inheritance_chain p
            ON p.descendent_id = i.inhparent
         WHERE i.inhrelid = (
            SELECT c1.oid
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
             WHERE c1.relname = $4
               AND n1.nspname = $3
        )
    )
    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT true
          FROM inheritance_chain
         WHERE inheritance_level = COALESCE($5, inheritance_level)
           AND descendent_id = (
                SELECT c1.oid
                  FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c1
                  JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n1
                    ON c1.relnamespace = n1.oid
                 WHERE c1.relname = $4
                   AND n1.nspname = $3
        )
    );

Function: public._are(text, name[], name[], text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    what    ALIAS FOR $1;
    extras  ALIAS FOR $2;
    missing ALIAS FOR $3;
    descr   ALIAS FOR $4;
    msg     TEXT    := '';
    res     BOOLEAN := TRUE;
BEGIN
    IF extras[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res = FALSE;
        msg := E'\n' || diag(
            '    Extra ' || what || E':\n        '
            ||  _ident_array_to_sorted_string( extras, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;
    IF missing[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res = FALSE;
        msg := msg || E'\n' || diag(
            '    Missing ' || what || E':\n        '
            ||  _ident_array_to_sorted_string( missing, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;

    RETURN ok(res, descr) || msg;
END;

Function: public._areni(text, text[], text[], text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    what    ALIAS FOR $1;
    extras  ALIAS FOR $2;
    missing ALIAS FOR $3;
    descr   ALIAS FOR $4;
    msg     TEXT    := '';
    res     BOOLEAN := TRUE;
BEGIN
    IF extras[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res = FALSE;
        msg := E'\n' || diag(
            '    Extra ' || what || E':\n        '
            ||  _array_to_sorted_string( extras, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;
    IF missing[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res = FALSE;
        msg := msg || E'\n' || diag(
            '    Missing ' || what || E':\n        '
            ||  _array_to_sorted_string( missing, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;

    RETURN ok(res, descr) || msg;
END;

Function: public._array_to_sorted_string(name[], text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT array_to_string(ARRAY(
        SELECT $1[i]
          FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($1, 1)) s(i)
         ORDER BY $1[i]
    ), $2);

Function: public._assets_are(text, text[], text[], text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT _areni(
        $1,
        ARRAY(
            SELECT UPPER($2[i]) AS thing
              FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($2, 1)) s(i)
            EXCEPT
            SELECT $3[i]
              FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($3, 1)) s(i)
             ORDER BY thing
        ),
        ARRAY(
            SELECT $3[i] AS thing
              FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($3, 1)) s(i)
            EXCEPT
            SELECT UPPER($2[i])
              FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($2, 1)) s(i)
             ORDER BY thing
        ),
        $4
    );

Function: public._cast_exists(name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS (
       SELECT TRUE
         FROM pg_catalog.pg_cast c
        WHERE _cmp_types(castsource, $1)
          AND _cmp_types(casttarget, $2)
   );

Function: public._cast_exists(name, name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS (
       SELECT TRUE
         FROM pg_catalog.pg_cast c
         JOIN pg_catalog.pg_proc p ON c.castfunc = p.oid
        WHERE _cmp_types(castsource, $1)
          AND _cmp_types(casttarget, $2)
          AND p.proname   = $3
   );

Function: public._cast_exists(name, name, name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS (
       SELECT TRUE
         FROM pg_catalog.pg_cast c
         JOIN pg_catalog.pg_proc p ON c.castfunc = p.oid
         JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON p.pronamespace = n.oid
        WHERE _cmp_types(castsource, $1)
          AND _cmp_types(casttarget, $2)
          AND n.nspname   = $3
          AND p.proname   = $4
   );

Function: public._cdi(name, name, anyelement)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT col_default_is(
        $1, $2, $3,
        'Column ' || quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || ' should default to '
        || COALESCE( quote_literal($3), 'NULL')
    );

Function: public._cdi(name, name, anyelement, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

BEGIN
    IF NOT _cexists( $1, $2 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( $4 ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || ' does not exist' );
    END IF;

    IF NOT _has_def( $1, $2 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( $4 ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || ' has no default' );
    END IF;

    RETURN _def_is(
        pg_catalog.pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid),
        pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
        $3, $4
    )
      FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c, pg_catalog.pg_attribute a, pg_catalog.pg_attrdef d
     WHERE c.oid = a.attrelid
       AND pg_table_is_visible(c.oid)
       AND a.atthasdef
       AND a.attrelid = d.adrelid
       AND a.attnum = d.adnum
       AND c.relname = $1
       AND a.attnum > 0
       AND NOT a.attisdropped
       AND a.attname = $2;
END;

Function: public._cdi(name, name, name, anyelement, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

BEGIN
    IF NOT _cexists( $1, $2, $3 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( $5 ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || '.' || quote_ident($3) || ' does not exist' );
    END IF;

    IF NOT _has_def( $1, $2, $3 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( $5 ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || '.' || quote_ident($3) || ' has no default' );
    END IF;

    RETURN _def_is(
        pg_catalog.pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid),
        pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
        $4, $5
    )
      FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n, pg_catalog.pg_class c, pg_catalog.pg_attribute a,
           pg_catalog.pg_attrdef d
     WHERE n.oid = c.relnamespace
       AND c.oid = a.attrelid
       AND a.atthasdef
       AND a.attrelid = d.adrelid
       AND a.attnum = d.adnum
       AND n.nspname = $1
       AND c.relname = $2
       AND a.attnum > 0
       AND NOT a.attisdropped
       AND a.attname = $3;
END;

Function: public._cexists(name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT true
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute a ON c.oid = a.attrelid
         WHERE c.relname = $1
           AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid)
           AND a.attnum > 0
           AND NOT a.attisdropped
           AND a.attname = $2
    );

Function: public._cexists(name, name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT true
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class c ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute a ON c.oid = a.attrelid
         WHERE n.nspname = $1
           AND c.relname = $2
           AND a.attnum > 0
           AND NOT a.attisdropped
           AND a.attname = $3
    );

Function: public._ckeys(name, bpchar)

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

    SELECT * FROM _keys($1, $2) LIMIT 1;

Function: public._ckeys(name, name, bpchar)

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

    SELECT * FROM _keys($1, $2, $3) LIMIT 1;

Function: public._cleanup()

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    DROP SEQUENCE __tresults___numb_seq;
    DROP TABLE __tcache__;
    DROP SEQUENCE __tcache___id_seq;
    SELECT TRUE;

Function: public._cmp_types(oid, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    dtype TEXT := pg_catalog.format_type($1, NULL);
BEGIN
    RETURN dtype = _quote_ident_like($2, dtype);
END;

Function: public._col_is_null(name, name, name, text, boolean)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    qcol CONSTANT text := quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2) || '.' || quote_ident($3);
    c_desc CONSTANT text := coalesce(
        $4,
        'Column ' || qcol || ' should '
            || CASE WHEN $5 THEN 'be NOT' ELSE 'allow' END || ' NULL'
    );
BEGIN
    IF NOT _cexists( $1, $2, $3 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( c_desc ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || qcol || ' does not exist' );
    END IF;
    RETURN ok(
        EXISTS(
            SELECT true
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class c ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute a ON c.oid = a.attrelid
             WHERE n.nspname = $1
               AND c.relname = $2
               AND a.attnum  > 0
               AND NOT a.attisdropped
               AND a.attname    = $3
               AND a.attnotnull = $5
        ), c_desc
    );
END;

Function: public._col_is_null(name, name, text, boolean)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    qcol CONSTANT text := quote_ident($1) || '.' || quote_ident($2);
    c_desc CONSTANT text := coalesce(
        $3,
        'Column ' || qcol || ' should '
            || CASE WHEN $4 THEN 'be NOT' ELSE 'allow' END || ' NULL'
    );
BEGIN
    IF NOT _cexists( $1, $2 ) THEN
        RETURN fail( c_desc ) || E'\n'
            || diag ('    Column ' || qcol || ' does not exist' );
    END IF;
    RETURN ok(
        EXISTS(
            SELECT true
              FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
              JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute a ON c.oid = a.attrelid
             WHERE pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid)
               AND c.relname = $1
               AND a.attnum > 0
               AND NOT a.attisdropped
               AND a.attname    = $2
               AND a.attnotnull = $4
        ), c_desc
    );
END;

Function: public._constraint(name, bpchar, name[], text, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    akey NAME[];
    keys TEXT[] := '{}';
    have TEXT;
BEGIN
    FOR akey IN SELECT * FROM _keys($1, $2) LOOP
        IF akey = $3 THEN RETURN pass($4); END IF;
        keys = keys || akey::text;
    END LOOP;
    IF array_upper(keys, 0) = 1 THEN
        have := 'No ' || $5 || ' constraints';
    ELSE
        have := array_to_string(keys, E'\n              ');
    END IF;

    RETURN fail($4) || E'\n' || diag(
             '        have: ' || have
       || E'\n        want: ' || CASE WHEN $3 IS NULL THEN 'NULL' ELSE $3::text END
    );
END;

Function: public._constraint(name, name, bpchar, name[], text, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    akey NAME[];
    keys TEXT[] := '{}';
    have TEXT;
BEGIN
    FOR akey IN SELECT * FROM _keys($1, $2, $3) LOOP
        IF akey = $4 THEN RETURN pass($5); END IF;
        keys = keys || akey::text;
    END LOOP;
    IF array_upper(keys, 0) = 1 THEN
        have := 'No ' || $6 || ' constraints';
    ELSE
        have := array_to_string(keys, E'\n              ');
    END IF;

    RETURN fail($5) || E'\n' || diag(
             '        have: ' || have
       || E'\n        want: ' || CASE WHEN $4 IS NULL THEN 'NULL' ELSE $4::text END
    );
END;

Function: public._contract_on(text)

Returns: "char"

Language: SQL

   SELECT CASE substring(LOWER($1) FROM 1 FOR 1)
          WHEN 's' THEN '1'::"char"
          WHEN 'u' THEN '2'::"char"
          WHEN 'i' THEN '3'::"char"
          WHEN 'd' THEN '4'::"char"
          ELSE          '0'::"char" END

Function: public._currtest()

Returns: integer

Language: PLPGSQL

BEGIN
    RETURN currval('__tresults___numb_seq');
EXCEPTION
    WHEN object_not_in_prerequisite_state THEN RETURN 0;
END;

Function: public._db_privs()

Returns: name[]

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    pgversion INTEGER := pg_version_num();
BEGIN
    IF pgversion < 80200 THEN
        RETURN ARRAY['CREATE', 'TEMPORARY'];
    ELSE
        RETURN ARRAY['CREATE', 'CONNECT', 'TEMPORARY'];
    END IF;
END;

Function: public._def_is(text, text, anyelement, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    thing text;
BEGIN
    -- Function, cast, or special SQL syntax.
    IF $1 ~ '^[^'']+[(]' OR $1 ~ '[)]::[^'']+$' OR $1 = ANY('{CURRENT_CATALOG,CURRENT_ROLE,CURRENT_SCHEMA,CURRENT_USER,SESSION_USER,USER,CURRENT_DATE,CURRENT_TIME,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,LOCALTIME,LOCALTIMESTAMP}') THEN
        RETURN is( $1, $3, $4 );
    END IF;

    EXECUTE 'SELECT is('
             || COALESCE($1, 'NULL' || '::' || $2) || '::' || $2 || ', '
             || COALESCE(quote_literal($3), 'NULL') || '::' || $2 || ', '
             || COALESCE(quote_literal($4), 'NULL')
    || ')' INTO thing;
    RETURN thing;
END;

Function: public._definer(name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT is_definer FROM tap_funky WHERE name = $1 AND is_visible;

Function: public._definer(name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT is_definer FROM tap_funky WHERE schema = $1 AND name = $2

Function: public._definer(name, name, name[])

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT is_definer
      FROM tap_funky
     WHERE schema = $1
       AND name   = $2
       AND args   = array_to_string($3, ',')

Function: public._definer(name, name[])

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT is_definer
      FROM tap_funky
     WHERE name = $1
       AND args = array_to_string($2, ',')
       AND is_visible;

Function: public._dexists(name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

   SELECT EXISTS(
       SELECT true
         FROM pg_catalog.pg_type t
        WHERE t.typname = $1
          AND pg_catalog.pg_type_is_visible(t.oid)
   );

Function: public._dexists(name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

   SELECT EXISTS(
       SELECT true
         FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
         JOIN pg_catalog.pg_type t on n.oid = t.typnamespace
        WHERE n.nspname = $1
          AND t.typname = $2
   );

Function: public._do_ne(text, text, text, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    have    ALIAS FOR $1;
    want    ALIAS FOR $2;
    extras  TEXT[]  := '{}';
    missing TEXT[]  := '{}';
    res     BOOLEAN := TRUE;
    msg     TEXT    := '';
BEGIN
    BEGIN
        -- Find extra records.
        EXECUTE 'SELECT EXISTS ( '
             || '( SELECT * FROM ' || have || ' EXCEPT ' || $4
             || '  SELECT * FROM ' || want
             || ' ) UNION ( '
             || '  SELECT * FROM ' || want || ' EXCEPT ' || $4
             || '  SELECT * FROM ' || have
             || ' ) LIMIT 1 )' INTO res;

        -- Drop the temporary tables.
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || have;
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || want;
    EXCEPTION WHEN syntax_error OR datatype_mismatch THEN
        msg := E'\n' || diag(
            E'    Columns differ between queries:\n'
            || '        have: (' || _temptypes(have) || E')\n'
            || '        want: (' || _temptypes(want) || ')'
        );
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || have;
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || want;
        RETURN ok(FALSE, $3) || msg;
    END;

    -- Return the value from the query.
    RETURN ok(res, $3);
END;

Function: public._docomp(text, text, text, text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    have    ALIAS FOR $1;
    want    ALIAS FOR $2;
    extras  TEXT[]  := '{}';
    missing TEXT[]  := '{}';
    res     BOOLEAN := TRUE;
    msg     TEXT    := '';
    rec     RECORD;
BEGIN
    BEGIN
        -- Find extra records.
        FOR rec in EXECUTE 'SELECT * FROM ' || have || ' EXCEPT ' || $4
                        || 'SELECT * FROM ' || want LOOP
            extras := extras || rec::text;
        END LOOP;

        -- Find missing records.
        FOR rec in EXECUTE 'SELECT * FROM ' || want || ' EXCEPT ' || $4
                        || 'SELECT * FROM ' || have LOOP
            missing := missing || rec::text;
        END LOOP;

        -- Drop the temporary tables.
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || have;
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || want;
    EXCEPTION WHEN syntax_error OR datatype_mismatch THEN
        msg := E'\n' || diag(
            E'    Columns differ between queries:\n'
            || '        have: (' || _temptypes(have) || E')\n'
            || '        want: (' || _temptypes(want) || ')'
        );
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || have;
        EXECUTE 'DROP TABLE ' || want;
        RETURN ok(FALSE, $3) || msg;
    END;

    -- What extra records do we have?
    IF extras[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res := FALSE;
        msg := E'\n' || diag(
            E'    Extra records:\n        '
            ||  array_to_string( extras, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;

    -- What missing records do we have?
    IF missing[1] IS NOT NULL THEN
        res := FALSE;
        msg := msg || E'\n' || diag(
            E'    Missing records:\n        '
            ||  array_to_string( missing, E'\n        ' )
        );
    END IF;

    RETURN ok(res, $3) || msg;
END;

Function: public._error_diag(text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text, text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT COALESCE(
               COALESCE( NULLIF($1, '') || ': ', '' ) || COALESCE( NULLIF($2, ''), '' ),
               'NO ERROR FOUND'
           )
        || COALESCE(E'\n        DETAIL:     ' || nullif($3, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        HINT:       ' || nullif($4, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        SCHEMA:     ' || nullif($6, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        TABLE:      ' || nullif($7, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        COLUMN:     ' || nullif($8, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        CONSTRAINT: ' || nullif($9, ''), '')
        || COALESCE(E'\n        TYPE:       ' || nullif($10, ''), '')
        -- We need to manually indent all the context lines
        || COALESCE(E'\n        CONTEXT:\n'
               || regexp_replace(NULLIF( $5, ''), '^', '            ', 'gn'
           ), '');

Function: public._expand_context(bpchar)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

   SELECT CASE $1
          WHEN 'i' THEN 'implicit'
          WHEN 'a' THEN 'assignment'
          WHEN 'e' THEN 'explicit'
          ELSE          'unknown' END

Function: public._expand_on(bpchar)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

   SELECT CASE $1
          WHEN '1' THEN 'SELECT'
          WHEN '2' THEN 'UPDATE'
          WHEN '3' THEN 'INSERT'
          WHEN '4' THEN 'DELETE'
          ELSE          'UNKNOWN' END

Function: public._expand_vol(bpchar)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

   SELECT CASE $1
          WHEN 'i' THEN 'IMMUTABLE'
          WHEN 's' THEN 'STABLE'
          WHEN 'v' THEN 'VOLATILE'
          ELSE          'UNKNOWN' END

Function: public._ext_exists(name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS (
        SELECT TRUE
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_extension ex
         WHERE ex.extname = $1
    );

Function: public._ext_exists(name, name)

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS (
        SELECT TRUE
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_extension ex
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON ex.extnamespace = n.oid
         WHERE n.nspname  = $1
           AND ex.extname = $2
    );

Function: public._extensions()

Returns: SET OF name

Language: SQL

    SELECT extname FROM pg_catalog.pg_extension

Function: public._extensions(name)

Returns: SET OF name

Language: SQL

    SELECT e.extname
      FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
      JOIN pg_catalog.pg_extension e ON n.oid = e.extnamespace
     WHERE n.nspname = $1

Function: public._extras(bpchar, name, name[])

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

    SELECT _extras(ARRAY[$1], $2, $3);

Function: public._extras(bpchar, name[])

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

SELECT _extras(ARRAY[$1], $2);

Function: public._extras(bpchar[], name, name[])

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

    SELECT ARRAY(
        SELECT c.relname
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class c ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
         WHERE c.relkind = ANY($1)
           AND n.nspname = $2
           AND c.relname NOT IN('pg_all_foreign_keys', 'tap_funky', '__tresults___numb_seq', '__tcache___id_seq')
        EXCEPT
        SELECT $3[i]
          FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($3, 1)) s(i)
    );

Function: public._extras(bpchar[], name[])

Returns: name[]

Language: SQL

    SELECT ARRAY(
        SELECT c.relname
          FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
          JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class c ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
         WHERE pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(c.oid)
           AND n.nspname <> 'pg_catalog'
           AND c.relkind = ANY($1)
           AND c.relname NOT IN ('__tcache__', 'pg_all_foreign_keys', 'tap_funky', '__tresults___numb_seq', '__tcache___id_seq')
        EXCEPT
        SELECT $2[i]
          FROM generate_series(1, array_upper($2, 1)) s(i)
    );

Function: public._finish(integer, integer, integer, boolean)

Returns: SET OF text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    curr_test ALIAS FOR $1;
    exp_tests INTEGER := $2;
    num_faild ALIAS FOR $3;
    plural    CHAR;
    raise_ex  ALIAS FOR $4;
BEGIN
    plural    := CASE exp_tests WHEN 1 THEN '' ELSE 's' END;

    IF curr_test IS NULL THEN
        RAISE EXCEPTION '# No tests run!';
    END IF;

    IF exp_tests = 0 OR exp_tests IS NULL THEN
         -- No plan. Output one now.
        exp_tests = curr_test;
        RETURN NEXT '1..' || exp_tests;
    END IF;

    IF curr_test <> exp_tests THEN
        RETURN NEXT diag(
            'Looks like you planned ' || exp_tests || ' test' ||
            plural || ' but ran ' || curr_test
        );
    ELSIF num_faild > 0 THEN
        IF raise_ex THEN
            RAISE EXCEPTION  '% test% failed of %', num_faild, CASE num_faild WHEN 1 THEN '' ELSE 's' END, exp_tests;
        END IF;
        RETURN NEXT diag(
            'Looks like you failed ' || num_faild || ' test' ||
            CASE num_faild WHEN 1 THEN '' ELSE 's' END
            || ' of ' || exp_tests
        );
    ELSE

    END IF;
    RETURN;
END;

Function: public._fkexists(name, name, name[])

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT TRUE
           FROM pg_all_foreign_keys
          WHERE fk_schema_name    = $1
            AND quote_ident(fk_table_name)     = quote_ident($2)
            AND fk_columns = $3
    );

Function: public._fkexists(name, name[])

Returns: boolean

Language: SQL

    SELECT EXISTS(
        SELECT TRUE
           FROM pg_all_foreign_keys
          WHERE quote_ident(fk_table_name)     = quote_ident($1)
            AND pg_catalog.pg_table_is_visible(fk_table_oid)
            AND fk_columns = $2
    );

Function: public._fprivs_are(text, name, name[], text)

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    grants TEXT[] := _get_func_privs($2, $1);
BEGIN
    IF grants[1] = 'undefined_function' THEN
        RETURN ok(FALSE, $4) || E'\n' || diag(
            '    Function ' || $1 || ' does not exist'
        );
    ELSIF grants[1] = 'undefined_role' THEN
        RETURN ok(FALSE, $4) || E'\n' || diag(
            '    Role ' || quote_ident($2) || ' does not exist'
        );
    END IF;
    RETURN _assets_are('privileges', grants, $3, $4);
END;

Function: public._func_compare(name, name, anyelement, anyelement, text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT CASE WHEN $3 IS NULL
      THEN ok( FALSE, $5 ) || _nosuch($1, $2, '{}')
      ELSE is( $3, $4, $5 )
      END;

Function: public._func_compare(name, name, boolean, text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT CASE WHEN $3 IS NULL
      THEN ok( FALSE, $4 ) || _nosuch($1, $2, '{}')
      ELSE ok( $3, $4 )
      END;

Function: public._func_compare(name, name, name[], anyelement, anyelement, text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT CASE WHEN $4 IS NULL
      THEN ok( FALSE, $6 ) || _nosuch($1, $2, $3)
      ELSE is( $4, $5, $6 )
      END;

Function: public._func_compare(name, name, name[], boolean, text)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT CASE WHEN $4 IS NULL
      THEN ok( FALSE, $5 ) || _nosuch($1, $2, $3)
      ELSE ok( $4, $5 )
      END;

Function: public._funkargs(name[])

Returns: text

Language: PLPGSQL

BEGIN
    RETURN array_to_string($1::regtype[], ',');
EXCEPTION WHEN undefined_object THEN
    RETURN array_to_string($1, ',');
END;

Function: public._get(text)

Returns: integer

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    ret integer;
BEGIN
    EXECUTE 'SELECT value FROM __tcache__ WHERE label = ' || quote_literal($1) || ' LIMIT 1' INTO ret;
    RETURN ret;
END;

Function: public._get_ac_privs(name, text)

Returns: text[]

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    privs  TEXT[] := ARRAY['INSERT', 'REFERENCES', 'SELECT', 'UPDATE'];
    grants TEXT[] := '{}';
BEGIN
    FOR i IN 1..array_upper(privs, 1) LOOP
        BEGIN
            IF pg_catalog.has_any_column_privilege($1, $2, privs[i]) THEN
                grants := grants || privs[i];
            END IF;
        EXCEPTION WHEN undefined_table THEN
            -- Not a valid table name.
            RETURN '{undefined_table}';
        WHEN undefined_object THEN
            -- Not a valid role.
            RETURN '{undefined_role}';
        WHEN invalid_parameter_value THEN
            -- Not a valid permission on this version of PostgreSQL; ignore;
        END;
    END LOOP;
    RETURN grants;
END;

Function: public._get_col_ns_type(name, name, name)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    -- Always include the namespace.
    SELECT CASE WHEN pg_catalog.pg_type_is_visible(t.oid)
                THEN quote_ident(tn.nspname) || '.'
                ELSE ''
           END || pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod)
      FROM pg_catalog.pg_namespace n
      JOIN pg_catalog.pg_class c      ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
      JOIN pg_catalog.pg_attribute a  ON c.oid = a.attrelid
      JOIN pg_catalog.pg_type t       ON a.atttypid = t.oid
      JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace tn ON t.typnamespace = tn.oid
     WHERE n.nspname = $1
       AND c.relname = $2
       AND a.attname = $3
       AND attnum    > 0
       AND NOT a.attisdropped

Function: public._get_col_privs(name, text, name)

Returns: text[]

Language: PLPGSQL

DECLARE
    privs  TEXT[] := ARRAY['INSERT', 'REFERENCES', 'SELECT', 'UPDATE'];
    grants TEXT[] := '{}';
BEGIN
    FOR i IN 1..array_upper(privs, 1) LOOP
        IF pg_catalog.has_column_privilege($1, $2, $3, privs[i]) THEN
            grants := grants || privs[i];
        END IF;
    END LOOP;
    RETURN grants;
EXCEPTION
    -- Not a valid column name.
    WHEN undefined_column THEN RETURN '{undefined_column}';
    -- Not a valid table name.
    WHEN undefined_table THEN RETURN '{undefined_table}';
    -- Not a valid role.
    WHEN undefined_object THEN RETURN '{undefined_role}';
END;

Function: public._get_col_type(name, name)

Returns: text

Language: SQL

    SELECT pg_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod)
      FROM pg_catalog.pg_attribute a
